title: MurderBoardTest
body:
->Add clue
    ->Add clue Bullet Hole
        <<addClue MurderBoard bullethole>>
    ->Add clue Fingerprints
        <<addClue MurderBoard fingerprints>>
    ->Add clue Whiskey Glass
        <<addClue MurderBoard whiskeyglass>>
    ->Add clue 3
        <<addClue MurderBoard three>>
->Add suspect
    ->Add suspect Kyle
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard kyle>>
    ->Add suspect Logan
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard logan>>
    ->Add suspect Lola
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard lola>>
    ->Add suspect Nora
        <<addSuspect MurderBoard nora>>
->Connect clue to suspect
    ->Add clue 0...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard zero zodiac>>
    ->Add clue 1...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard one zodiac>>
    ->Add clue 2...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard two zodiac>>
    ->Add clue 3...
        ->...to suspect Bill 
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three bill>>
        ->...to suspect Elvis
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three elvis>>
        ->...to suspect Lego
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three lego>>
        ->...to suspect Zodiac
            <<moveClueToSuspect MurderBoard three zodiac>>

title: MurderBoard
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
I should start mapping out the investigation.
->Place discovered clues on the board
->Place known suspects on the board
    <<if $lolaIsSuspect == true>>
    ->I should Lola as a suspect.
    <<endif>>
    <<if $noraIsSuspect == true>>
    ->I should Nora as a suspect.
    <<endif>>
    <<if $loganIsSuspect == true>>
    ->I should Logan as a suspect.
    <<endif>>
    <<if $rachaelIsSuspect == true>>
    ->I should Rachael as a suspect.
    <<endif>>
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
